name: AT&T
description: AT&T Developer Program is the API platform for all AT&T devices and the AT&T network. AT&T provides device, call, location, messaging, speech, notifications, payments as well as advertising and healthcare solutions across multiple devices and mobile operating systems.

apis.name: AT&T API
apis.description: AT&T Developer Program is the API platform for all AT&T devices and the AT&T network. AT&T provides device, call, location, messaging, speech, notifications, payments as well as advertising and healthcare solutions across multiple devices and mobile operating systems.

apis.name: AT&T Device Capabilities
apis.description: The AT&T Device Capabilities API—still in development—provides an effective way to identify the end user's device and its capabilities so you can develop applications that improve the best user experience and support. Device Capabilities is offered only as a preview at this time. Further development of the API is in progres

apis.name: AT&T mHealth Platform
apis.description: The mHealth Platform supports the building and running of complete end-to-end health solutions for consumers. It leverages data acquisition and management from any source—including devices, applications, and clinical trials—to help improve health outcomes and reduce application development and management costs.

apis.name: AT&T MMS
apis.description: Multimedia Messaging Service (MMS) greatly enhances the power of your communications by moving beyond the text-only capabilities of Short Message Service (SMS) messaging. With MMS, users can send messages from their mobile device to your application ("mobile originate") or your application can send messages to one or more mobile users ("mobile terminate"). The MMS content can include video, images, audio, and synchronized multimedia integration language (SMIL) formatting as well as plain text.

apis.name: AT&T Notary Management
apis.description: The Notary Management API is used to encrypt and sign documents in a secure and tamper resistant manner. This method must be used to encrypt and secure the Payment detail information (which is essentially a document) for later use in the Payment API NewTransaction or NewSubscription methods.

apis.name: AT&T Payment
apis.description: The Payment service is a flexible API-based solution that gives developers and merchants the ability to charge goods and services directly to an AT&T subscriber bill for payment.

apis.name: AT&T SMS
apis.description: Short Message Service (SMS) empowers you to reach users with targeted alerts and information and it enables customers to connect back to you. With SMS, users can use text messaging from mobile to your application and from your application you can send messages to one or more mobile users. In addition to single-byte character support e.g. ASCII, the RESTful SMS API also supports a variety of messages with multiple-byte character sets e.g. iconographic characters, of the Chinese Han i.e. Language: zh-Hans character set.

apis.name: AT&T Synaptic Compute
apis.description: Want more computing capacity without the hardware headaches? We’ve designed AT&T Synaptic Compute as a Service with VMware vCloud Datacenter Service® for you. Get quick, secure access to virtual infrastructure, servers and storage but not the costs, delays and difficulties of adding physical hardware. We offer unlimited computing capacity, while you provide and manage the operating system, database and application. To manage your service, choose either Graphical User Interface (GUI) or Application Programming Interfaces (APIs).

apis.name: AT&T WAP Push
apis.description: WAP Push is an ideal technology for reaching users of legacy devices that have limited message content, formatting and viewing capabilities. This technology can deliver WAP Push messages to the user which in turn may be viewed by the user in their device browser and in a way that is unconstrained by messaging client display limitations.
